org.jooq
Interface AliasProvider<T extends AliasProvider<T>>

All Superinterfaces:
QueryPartProvider, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
CaseConditionStep<T>, CaseWhenStep<V,T>, Field<T>, Table<R>, TableField<R,T>, UDTField<R,T>, UpdatableTable<R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TableFieldImpl, TableImpl, UDTFieldImpl, UpdatableTableImpl
public interface AliasProvider<T extends AliasProvider<T>>
extends QueryPartProvider

A QueryPart that can create an aliased QueryPart of itself

Author:
Lukas Eder

Method Summary
 T as(java.lang.String alias)
          Get an aliased QueryPart.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.jooq.QueryPartProvider
getQueryPart
 

Method Detail

as

T as(java.lang.String alias)
Get an aliased QueryPart. An aliased QueryPart should render SQL as follows:
  • In declarative query sections : [QueryPart.toSQLReference() <alias>]
  • In referencial query sections : [<alias>]

Parameters:
alias - The alias name
Returns:
The aliased QueryPart
